attributes.action: Free Hanan from prison in Egypt
attributes.additional_details:
Call on President Abdel Fattah el-Sisi to:
•Drop all charges against Hanan immediately and unconditionally
attributes.background: Hanans' husband was last seen injured when at protest in 2013. He then disappeared at the hands of Egyptian secret services-so she began searching, even setting up groups for families with similar problems. But when at a prison, she was detained and imprisoned for being part of a banned group.

rejection.details:
This isn't something the UK Government or Parliament could do.

If you'd like the UK Government to raise this case with the Government of Egypt, you could start a new petition asking for that to happen.
